name: Telescope Words A-Z Quiz Series - C | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
A telescope word is a word that, when you drop the first letter, becomes a new word, and when you drop the first letter again, it becomes a new word one more time.  For instance, if a clue reads "Beverage - Skating arena - Pen fluid," the answer would be "drink" because the answers read as "Drink - Rink - Ink."  Remember, just write the longest word, and each begins with a C!

Box - Grade - Consumed
Religious rule - Soon - Prefix meaning opposite
Furniture - Baldy's want - It's all around
Silly fool - Camel part - Baseball ref.
